details: By candlelight and hearth-glow The world shrinks to arms-length in the murk. A band of shadow-cloaked orc raiders, scouting for targets. The foe's weapons glanced off enchanted armor. A well-timed spell from their caster turned the tide.
By candlelight and hearth-glow goats picking their way along cliffs. They have found An ancient sunken citadel from the Empire of Dust. Sunken Citadel was once a center of faith before its fall.
Sons of the Wolf forces have intercepted the caravan en route to Belfos.

summary: Trade routes near Windleigh grow dangerous
details: Merchants speak of losses. Some refuse to travel until the roads are secured.

summary: The Wandering Peddlers makes camp under escort
details: Road to Belfos (road) quiet tonight.

summary: The Hawk Compact eyes Belfos for its salt
details: Desperate for salt, the faction has decided to take the settlement by force.

summary: The Grim Wolves grows in power!
details: Through hardship and battle, the members of The Grim Wolves have reached level 2.

summary: The Grim Wolves spot signs of danger
details: The ruins of a dwarven waystation, recently looted.

summary: The Grim Wolves skirt around wary orc raiders
details: With ale flowing in taprooms the sharp tang of alpine herbs hung in the air. The world shrinks to arms-length in the murk. Several red-eyed in the dark orc raiders, dragging captives. Diplomacy prevailed where force might have failed.

summary: goblins provide shelter from the weather
details: By candlelight and hearth-glow mineral springs with a metallic tang hung in the air. A few shadow-cloaked goblins, tracking something. Words proved mightier than steel on this occasion.

summary: goatherds test Parthenius's Band's resolve with challenges
details: As the stars emerged one by one the clatter of loose stones. A few shadow-cloaked goatherds, apparently startled. Diplomacy prevailed where force might have failed.
Bound for Windleigh across road (~12 miles).
